quote: If Russia, or some other entity, was hacking, why did the White House wait so long to act? Why did they only complain after Hillary lost?
quotePlain: If Russia, or some other entity, was hacking, why did the White House wait so long to act? Why did they only complain after Hillary lost?
name: Donald Trump

checks.quote:
About a month before the Nov. 8  election, the Obama administration accused Russia of interfering in the U.S. elections, directing the release of emails "from US persons and institutions, including from US political organizations."

This didn’t happen under the radar. Trump was confronted with it at the final presidential debate.
checks.quotePlain:
About a month before the Nov. 8 election, the Obama administration accused Russia of interfering in the U.S. elections, directing the release of emails “from US persons and institutions, including from US political organizations.”
This didn’t happen under the radar. Trump was confronted with it at the final presidential debate.

claims.title: Obama administration did nothing about Russian hacking until after election
claims.negative: Obama administration didn't do nothing about Russian hacking until after election
claims.negativePlain: Obama administration didn’t do nothing about Russian hacking until after election
